metadata.title: CVE-2015-6240 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The chroot, jail, and zone connection plugins in ansible before 1.9.2 allow local users to escape a restricted environment via a symlink attack.

criterions.comment: ansible package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.2+dfsg-2').
